name: wrestle
actor_no_arg: You search for a victim to take on with your mad sleeper hold.
others_no_arg: $n searches for someone to wrestle down.
actor_found_target: You wrestle $M to the floor and pin $M there.

target_found: $n wrestles you to the floor and pins you.
actor_auto: Sorry, friend, I can't see that person here.
